casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the BRINLEY AMICON PROPERTY TRUST, a Nevada Trust. Brent D. Whitehead, as Co-Trustee of the Brinley Amicon Property Trust, Appellant,
v.
Lori Westinghouse, as parent and natural guardian for Brinley Helene-Mary Amicon, Respondent. No. 70025 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED MARCH 21, 2018

REVERSED.
